String.Source: Three lines? Why three? I thought most stanzas came in quatrains.
String.Dest: 三行？为啥是三行？我以为大部分的诗都是绝句。

String.Source: Maybe in Cyrodiil quatrains are the norm, but here in Skyrim they use all sorts of clumsy triplets and basically set fire to the language as a whole.
String.Dest: 也许在赛瑞迪尔，四行诗是常态，但天际省，却是利用各种复杂的三行诗，以及【大体上热情洋溢的语言】作为整体。

String.Source: Three lines? Why three? I thought most stanzas came in quatrains.
String.Dest: 三行？为啥是三行？我以为大部分的诗都是绝句。

String.Source: However, if my victory is to be resounding, I need to trounce the Nord on his own land, using his province's own rules.
String.Dest: 然而，如果我想获得一场轰动的胜利，那我需要用诺德的地盘上用他自己的规则来给他痛击。

String.Source: Three lines? Why three? I thought most stanzas came in quatrains.
String.Dest: 三行？为啥是三行？我以为大部分的诗都是绝句。

String.Source: In fact, I've adhered to the rules of fair play through each of our duels, even as he's done everything save pay an army to fight on his behalf.
String.Dest: 实际上，在决斗时我已经尽量做到遵守规则，公平合理，即使这家伙直接就雇佣了几个人来帮他打。

String.Source: Three lines? Why three? I thought most stanzas came in quatrains.
String.Dest: 三行？为啥是三行？我以为大部分的诗都是绝句。

String.Source: As he could not defeat me, he has instead removed his hero's costume, and revealed himself to be an unwavering coward.
String.Dest: 他发现搞不过我，就脱下了他的英雄装扮，还原成一个【坚定】的懦夫。

String.Source: Three lines? Why three? I thought most stanzas came in quatrains.
String.Dest: 三行？为啥是三行？我以为大部分的诗都是绝句。

String.Source: He thinks that to play the bard means he will be immune from my blade, when my pen cuts deeper than any sword.
String.Dest: He thinks that to play the bard means he will be immune from my blade, when my pen cuts deeper than any sword.

String.Source: A fine request. A legend we scholars know all too well.
String.Dest: 一个很好的请求。【我们这些学者都很清楚的知道这是个传奇。】

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: What if I were a werewolf?
String.Dest: 要是我也是狼人呢？

String.Source: If you were, I wouldn't hold it against you. Not until you bit someone's ear off and filled the halls with your fleas.
String.Dest: If you were, I wouldn't hold it against you. Not until you bit someone's ear off and filled the halls with your fleas.

String.Source: I don't care if the Nord is a werewolf or a cliff racer. He's besmirched my honor and I'll seek retribution until it's restored.
String.Dest: 我才不管这个诺德人是狼人还是崖壁鸟。他玷污了我的荣誉，我会让他为此付出代价。

String.Source: What if I were a werewolf?
String.Dest: 要是我也是狼人呢？

String.Source: Why not just kill him?
String.Dest: 为什么不直接宰了他？

String.Source: Oh, I've tried many times, and each instance he's used treachery and deceit to fashion a narrow escape.
String.Dest: 噢，我试过许多次了，每一次都是因为他的欺骗和背叛导致了一次狼狈的逃跑

String.Source: As a gentleman I have fought him according to the rules of fair play, and never once thought to sink to his level.
String.Dest: 作为一个绅士我根据公平竞争的原则和他战斗，从没把自己拉低到和他一个档次上。

String.Source: Why not just kill him?
String.Dest: 为什么不直接宰了他？

String.Source: Why not just kill him?
String.Dest: 为什么不直接宰了他？

String.Source: (Laughs) Never in my wildest fantasies did I think he would try to elevate his level to mine!
String.Dest: (笑声)我真是做梦都没有想过他会试图把自己的水平捧得跟我一样高啊！

String.Source: Why not just kill him?
String.Dest: 为什么不直接宰了他？

String.Source: He thinks to escape me by becoming a bard? The fool has no idea that to lose in this manner will crush him harder than any death.
String.Dest: 他以为摇身一变成为一个吟游诗人就能躲过我的法眼？脑残根本不知道以这种窝囊的方式会让他输的比战死难看得多。

String.Source: Speaking of the undead, your eyes...
String.Dest: 说起不死生物，你的眼睛……

String.Source: A hereditary affliction. I have my father's eyes. He was a great man, just misunderstood.
String.Dest: 这痛楚是传承而来的。我继承了我父亲的事业。他是个伟大的人，只是被误解了。

String.Source: Speaking of the undead, your eyes...
String.Dest: 说起不死生物，你的眼睛……

String.Source: I remember one time the Nord wouldn't shut up about how my father was a Gehenoth, and my mother a Daedric spider.
String.Dest: 我记得有一次，那个诺德人一直说我爸爸是Gehenoth，我妈妈是个魔族蜘蛛，怎么也不肯闭嘴。

String.Source: Speaking of the undead, your eyes...
String.Dest: 说起不死生物，你的眼睛……

String.Source: He said it was the only way to explain my spindly arms and leathery face.
String.Dest: 他说这是解释我细长的胳膊和坚韧的脸的唯一方法。

String.Source: Speaking of the undead, your eyes...
String.Dest: 说起不死生物，你的眼睛……

String.Source: Such is his lack of scruples, that he would resort to hurling insults at my noble ancestry.
String.Dest: 因为他缺乏治疗，所以他才会肆意的辱骂我的高贵血统。

String.Source: As much as it pains me, we can't have the duel now. Preparations are being made for the burning of King Olaf. It will have to wait.
String.Dest: 令我痛心的是，我们现在不能决斗。我正在为火烧奥拉夫节做准备。决斗再必须等等。

String.Source: The Nord!! What's he doing here? The poem, it isn't ready!
String.Dest: 这个诺德人，他在这里干什么！这首诗还没准备好呢！

String.Source: We'll duel soon enough! So long as the moons still circle the sky, I will send him to whatever mead hall the Nords reserve for cowards!
String.Dest: 我们很快就会决斗了！只要月亮还呆在天上。我就会把他送到哪个诺德人为懦夫准备的蜜酒馆里！

String.Source: Wintery...no, wintry...it betrays its wintry master...That's it! Let's see that fool of a Nord top this!
String.Dest: 温特瑞。。。不，冬天的。。。他背叛了他的冬导师。。。就是这样！让我们看看这个诺德蠢货做这事！

String.Source: Wait, I know you...Weren't you the one with that Nord? No, it can't be...no mortal would choose the company of a man who smelled like a pig's bowels.
String.Dest: 等等，我知道你……你是不是就是跟那个诺德人在一起的家伙？不，这个不可能……没有哪个凡人会选一个闻起来一股猪粪味儿的家伙当同伴。

String.Source: Wintery...no, wintry...it betrays its wintry master...That's it! Let's see that fool of a Nord top this!
String.Dest: 温特瑞。。。不，冬天的。。。他背叛了他的冬导师。。。就是这样！让我们看看这个诺德蠢货做这事！

String.Source: Step carefully, brethren. If you wish to act, it would be best to do so before she gains Pantea's attention.
String.Dest: 小心，弟兄们。如果你想行动，最好是做她吸引潘提亚的注意之前。

String.Source: Do you mean Fironet? Perhaps I might have a bite.
String.Dest: 你是说法萝娜? 也许我该来一口。

String.Source: Caves don't have windows. That's stupid.
String.Dest: 洞穴里连窗户都没有，太傻了。

String.Source: I know that you simpleton! It's a metaphor. Have you never seen the moon from inside the Eldergleam?
String.Dest: 我知道，你个傻蛋！那是个暗喻。你难道在古藤圣所里面见到过月亮？

String.Source: For some of us, a cave is practically home. Which is the point I am trying to drive home, but the subtlety of it was apparently lost on you.
String.Dest: For some of us, a cave is practically home. Which is the point I am trying to drive home, but the subtlety of it was apparently lost on you.

String.Source: Caves don't have windows. That's stupid.
String.Dest: 洞穴里连窗户都没有，太傻了。

String.Source: An original ballad.
String.Dest: 一首民谣。

String.Source: I see. This one isn't original in and of itself. I heard it sung by a bard in training over at the Skeever.
String.Dest: 我明白了，这并不是原版。我在眨眼雪鼠酒店听一个见习吟游诗人唱过。

String.Source: A beautiful woman, and socially daft. While she spends time at the Skeever, she hardly converses with anyone. No one will ever notice she's gone.
String.Dest: 一个漂亮却不擅长社交的女人。当她在眨眼雪鼠消磨时间的时候，她从不和其他人交谈。所以当她离去时，没人记得。

String.Source: Who is this Redguard you speak of?
String.Dest: 你提到的这个红卫是谁？

String.Source: Ah, there you are! Sit down, have some spiced wine, the night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 啊，你在那！ 坐下，喝一些调味酒，今晚就像处女一样美好啊！

String.Source: I knew that! The original line was "Time cast a spell on the day." But then I imagined that Nord saying, "What if the spell was a fireball?"
String.Dest: 我知道！原话是“时间在那天施了一个咒语。”但我又在想象到那个诺德人说，“如果那个咒语是一个火球呢？”

String.Source: No, the current line as construed is perfect. It's a metaphor, of some sort. You just lack the intelligence to understand it.
String.Dest: 不，这诗句是完美的。这是某种隐喻。你尚缺乏能够理解它的智慧罢了。

String.Source: So alas, it is left up to a perfect mind to explain it to you. The poem is about how caves are a home, for the undead whose winter never comes.
String.Dest: 咳，现在由一个完美的心灵解释给你听。这首诗是讲述洞穴是如何成为永远不会感受到冬天寒冷的不死者的家园的。

String.Source: The "Age of Aggression."
String.Dest: 这是"大肆侵略的时代"

String.Source: Certainly. It's a fine tune, and brings glory to the Empire. May we bring death to all usurpers!
String.Dest: 确实，这是个好曲子，给帝国带来了荣耀，愿我们为篡位者带来死亡！

String.Source: Sounds like a cozy place. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 听上去是个舒服的地方。朗诵你的诗歌吧。

String.Source: The poem reads as follows: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 那首诗歌是这样写的：洞穴中传来龙语的轻吟，火虫在枯叶上写下诗篇。

String.Source: Sounds like a cozy place. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 听上去是个舒服的地方。朗诵你的诗歌吧。

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: Sounds like a cozy place. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 听上去是个舒服的地方。朗诵你的诗歌吧。

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: The poem reads as follows: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 那首诗歌是这样写的：洞穴中传来龙语的轻吟，火虫在枯叶上写下诗篇。

String.Source: I know the place. Proceed.
String.Dest: 我认识这个地方，继续前进！

String.Source: I know the place. Proceed.
String.Dest: 我认识这个地方，继续前进！

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: I know the place. Proceed.
String.Dest: 我认识这个地方，继续前进！

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: I would be honored to hear your words.
String.Dest: 很荣幸能听你说话。

String.Source: You're well-mannered. I didn't expect this. So while the honor is mine to read to one so noble, the pleasure is yours to keep.
String.Dest: 想不到你的教养还不错嘛。当我将我过往的荣耀显露与你，你便该当如此谦逊。

String.Source: I would be honored to hear your words.
String.Dest: 很荣幸能听你说话。

String.Source: The inspiration came to me after a mounted duel with the Nord, which he managed to survive by sabotaging my horse.
String.Dest: 那个启示来自一次跟诺德人的骑战，他想靠偷袭我的马来取胜。

String.Source: I would be honored to hear your words.
String.Dest: 很荣幸能听你说话。

String.Source: I was walking along with my servant when I came across a vacant domicile. The name of the house was "Breezehome."
String.Dest: 当我偶遇到一个空虚的住宅的时候我正在和我的仆人走在一起。此房名为“风宅”。

String.Source: I would be honored to hear your words.
String.Dest: 很荣幸能听你说话。

String.Source: It reminded me of my father's home, where the cool breeze returned to.
String.Dest: 这屋子让我想起了我父亲的家，凉爽的微风常常从那儿吹过。

String.Source: I'd rather not listen to your awful poetry, thank you.
String.Dest: 我宁愿不听你的烂歌，谢谢。

String.Source: My...awful poetry? You haven't even heard a single line, and you choose to make assumptions based on what? My appearance?
String.Dest: 我的……屎一样的诗？你连一句都没有听过，凭什么这么说？看脸吗？

String.Source: I'd rather not listen to your awful poetry, thank you.
String.Dest: 我宁愿不听你的烂歌，谢谢。

String.Source: I'd say your prejudice does you a disservice, you son of a scrib, but I doubt you are even equipped enough to know what prejudice is.
String.Dest: 我得说你的歧视也会让你受伤的，你个斯克力养的，但我怀疑你甚至没有足够的能力去知道什么是歧视。

String.Source: I'd rather not listen to your awful poetry, thank you.
String.Dest: 我宁愿不听你的烂歌，谢谢。

String.Source: So if you don't wish to hear it, fine. Its genius would be lost on you anyway.
String.Dest: 所以如果你不情愿听到这些，很好。这天赋将会离你而去。

String.Source: Skjarn's dead. Your feud is done.
String.Dest: 史卡盎死了，你们的恩怨了结了。

String.Source: Ha! Fantastic! I must admit, this isn't the manner in which I envisioned it, but it certainly doesn't lack for satisfaction!
String.Dest: 哈！好极了！我必须得承认，这不是我所设想的方式，但我当然对它特别满意！

String.Source: Skjarn's dead. Your feud is done.
String.Dest: 史卡盎死了，你们的恩怨了结了。

String.Source: There isn't enough gold in the coffers of the Blue Palace to thank you for delivering the news. That slobbering atronach haunts this world no more.
String.Dest: 蓝宫金库里所有的钱都不够用来感谢你为我们做的事情。那些垂涎三尺怪物再也不会在这个世界上自由自在的乱逛了。

String.Source: Skjarn's dead. Your feud is done.
String.Dest: 史卡盎死了，你们的恩怨了结了。

String.Source: But I can offer you a poem! Yes, a poem is what I can provide for you, if you wish to hear it.
String.Dest: 但是我能为你作诗！是的，如果你想听的话，我能为你作诗。

String.Source: What happened with Skjarn? Amalee and I left, but did you win the duel?
String.Dest: 史卡盎出了什么事？当时艾米莉跟着我走了，你的决斗赢了吗？

String.Source: Of course I won, but the brute managed to survive by hiding behind one of the guards.
String.Dest: 当然，我赢了，但那个野蛮人却躲在了守卫身后，苟延残喘的活了下去。

String.Source: What happened with Skjarn? Amalee and I left, but did you win the duel?
String.Dest: 史卡盎出了什么事？当时艾米莉跟着我走了，你的决斗赢了吗？

String.Source: A lowborn tactic to be sure, but one that could have been avoided had my squire bothered to bribe them.
String.Dest: 那固然是一个低劣的手段，不过如果我当初让我的扈从贿赂下那群守卫，这本可以避免。

String.Source: What happened with Skjarn? Amalee and I left, but did you win the duel?
String.Dest: 史卡盎出了什么事？当时艾米莉跟着我走了，你的决斗赢了吗？

String.Source: Which is something I shouldn't have to tell her to do.
String.Dest: 一件我本没必要叫她去做的事。

String.Source: What happened with Skjarn? Amalee and I left, but did you win the duel?
String.Dest: 史卡盎出了什么事？当时艾米莉跟着我走了，你的决斗赢了吗？

String.Source: I will just have to finish my poem and find a publisher. This way I can humiliate him through the power of my fame.
String.Dest: 我要完成我的诗，然后找到一个出版商。这样我就能通过我名誉的力量羞辱他了。

String.Source: What happened with Skjarn? Amalee and I left, but did you win the duel?
String.Dest: 史卡盎出了什么事？当时艾米莉跟着我走了，你的决斗赢了吗？

String.Source: In any event, the girl is fired. It seems there is only one person I can truly rely on to serve me.
String.Dest: 无论如何那姑娘被开除了。似乎我只有一个能真正信任的帮手了。

String.Source: Oh, I'm sure we'll find a way to pass the time. I wonder if that Redguard bard is still around...she has a lovely throat.
String.Dest: 哦，我想我们会找到一个打发时间的法子的。我不知道那个红卫诗人是不是还在……她那嗓子真是甜死人了。

String.Source: What will you do now that your nemesis is dead?
String.Dest: 现在你的宿敌已经死了，你有什么打算？

String.Source: I...I confess I haven't thought about it. But I was a gentleman far before I ever was a duelist. So I imagine there are other worlds to conquer.
String.Dest: 我...坦诚地说我没想过这个. 但我是个斗士之前首先是个绅士. 所以我想还有另一个世界等我征服.

String.Source: What will you do now that your nemesis is dead?
String.Dest: 现在你的宿敌已经死了，你有什么打算？

String.Source: Did you expect anything less? The answer to that question will tell you whether you're a fool.
String.Dest: 你的期望值比这还低吗？这事就看得出你是不是傻瓜了。

String.Source: It just keeps getting better and better. A true masterpiece.
String.Dest: 始终都在不断改进，无愧为真正的大师作品。

String.Source: But you certainly aren't. Oh no, you are a person of impeccable taste.
String.Dest: 但你当然不是。哦，不，你就是那个味道无可挑剔的人。

String.Source: It just keeps getting better and better. A true masterpiece.
String.Dest: 始终都在不断改进，无愧为真正的大师作品。

String.Source: It's a shame that there are only a few of us in all of Nirn capable of appreciating my work. Such is the tragedy of genius.
String.Dest: 真是遗憾，只有奈恩上的少数人才懂得欣赏我的工作，这就是天才的悲哀。

String.Source: It just keeps getting better and better. A true masterpiece.
String.Dest: 始终都在不断改进，无愧为真正的大师作品。

String.Source: An aspiring bard. Keep at it, boy, you'll get there soon enough.
String.Dest: 一个有理想的诗人。坚持下去，孩子，你的理想不用很久就能实现。

String.Source: Don't patronize me! You're like that Nord, constantly spreading lies about me and belittling my accomplishments!
String.Dest: Don't patronize me! You're like that Nord, constantly spreading lies about me and belittling my accomplishments!

String.Source: An aspiring bard. Keep at it, boy, you'll get there soon enough.
String.Dest: 一个有理想的诗人。坚持下去，孩子，你的理想不用很久就能实现。

String.Source: Oh, but he'll get his soon enough. We may have fought to a draw many times before, but this time I will surely reclaim my honor!
String.Dest: 噢，但是很快他就会尝到苦头。我们之前可能已经拔剑比试了许多次，但是这次我相信我会取回我的荣耀！

String.Source: An aspiring bard. Keep at it, boy, you'll get there soon enough.
String.Dest: 一个有理想的诗人。坚持下去，孩子，你的理想不用很久就能实现。

String.Source: With this poem, I have at last set myself on the stairway to perfection! Just three more lines, three measly steps.
String.Dest: 带着这诗，我已通向完美的阶梯之上！只需要三行，少得可怜的三行。

String.Source: An aspiring bard. Keep at it, boy, you'll get there soon enough.
String.Dest: 一个有理想的诗人。坚持下去，孩子，你的理想不用很久就能实现。

String.Source: Hm...you look like someone with a keen ear for poetry. Would you like to hear the weapon with which I will slay him?
String.Dest: 嘛…你看起来像是对流言蜚语极其敏感的人。你想用那只听听我武器们的声音，我会用那把削了他？

String.Source: What's the cause of this rift between you and the Nord?
String.Dest: 你们跟诺德是因为什么而决裂的？

String.Source: How should I know? He's the one who started this quarrel, but I aim to finish it, and I just about have. Just three more lines.
String.Dest: 我怎么知道？他挑起了争执，但是我会结束它的，并且我就要结束它了，只需要再说几句话就行。

String.Source: What's the cause of this rift between you and the Nord?
String.Dest: 你们跟诺德是因为什么而决裂的？

String.Source: Of course I can! In fact, I was waiting for you to ask.
String.Dest: Of course I can! In fact, I was waiting for you to ask.

String.Source: Can you tell me about your duels?
String.Dest: 你能告诉我关于你决斗的事吗？

String.Source: What's the cause of this rift between you and the Nord?
String.Dest: 你们跟诺德是因为什么而决裂的？

String.Source: It is not often I get to regale guests with stories of my heroism, and the dastardly villain who opposes me.
String.Dest: 这可不是常有的事：用我的英雄事迹来招待宾客，还有那些跟我对着干的刁民。

String.Source: Can you tell me about your duels?
String.Dest: 你能告诉我关于你决斗的事吗？

String.Source: What's the cause of this rift between you and the Nord?
String.Dest: 你们跟诺德是因为什么而决裂的？

String.Source: Which duel shall I relate to you? The two I recall most vividly was the bare knuckle brawl and the duel of spiced wine.
String.Dest: 我记得的最清楚的就是拼拳脚功夫和拼酒量，你说吧我要和你比哪个？

String.Source: Can you tell me about your duels?
String.Dest: 你能告诉我关于你决斗的事吗？

String.Source: What's the cause of this rift between you and the Nord?
String.Dest: 你们跟诺德是因为什么而决裂的？

String.Source: Of course I can! Which duel should I relate to you?
String.Dest: 我当然可以做到！我应该为你怎么做？

String.Source: Can you tell me about your duels?
String.Dest: 你能告诉我关于你决斗的事吗？

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: (Laughs) You jest! I will not deny the world such magnificence! I will finish the poem in due time.
String.Dest: (哈哈) 别开玩笑了。我当然不会拒绝如此大的恩惠。只是我会准时完成这首歌诗的。

String.Source: And my nemesis will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as treacherous fiends.
String.Dest: 而我的死敌也会从 Shor 认为该把那些十恶不赦的死鬼般的诺德人塞进去的茅坑深处听见它。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another.
String.Dest: 但今天是个庆祝的好日子！来眨眼雪鼠与我共饮吧！我为你举杯，为你歌颂，以君子之名向另一位君子致以我诚挚的祝福。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I will toast you and sing your praises, one gentleman to another. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但今晚是值得庆祝的！我会歌颂你，唱你的赞美诗！一个伟大的绅士！今夜才刚刚开始！

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: (Laughs) You jest! I will not deny the world such magnificence! I will finish the poem in due time.
String.Dest: (哈哈) 别开玩笑了。我当然不会拒绝如此大的恩惠。只是我会准时完成这首歌诗的。

String.Source: And my nemesis will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as treacherous fiends.
String.Dest: 而我的死敌也会从 Shor 认为该把那些十恶不赦的死鬼般的诺德人塞进去的茅坑深处听见它。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady.
String.Dest: 但今晚是一个值得庆贺的一晚！和我在眨眼雪鼠里喝上一杯！我会给你敬酒并对你大唱赞歌，正如一个绅士对女士所做的那样。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: (Laughs) You jest! I will not deny the world such magnificence! I will finish the poem in due time.
String.Dest: (哈哈) 别开玩笑了。我当然不会拒绝如此大的恩惠。只是我会准时完成这首歌诗的。

String.Source: And my nemesis will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as treacherous fiends.
String.Dest: 而我的死敌也会从 Shor 认为该把那些十恶不赦的死鬼般的诺德人塞进去的茅坑深处听见它。

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但是今晚我们要尽情庆祝！我会向你敬酒和歌颂赞美，如同绅士向淑女般。待此夜如同处子！

String.Source: I killed Skjarn specifically so the world would not have to hear your poetry.
String.Dest: 我杀了史卡盎 就是为了让天下人不用再听你吟诗了。

String.Source: I take it you had some sort of plan.
String.Dest: 我认为你有某种计划。

String.Source: Earlier that day, I had asked Angeline what ingredients, when eaten raw, would help one resist poison. One of them was garlic.
String.Dest: 当天早些时候，我问过安吉琳什么原料生吃时能帮助人们抵抗毒素。其中一个是大蒜。

String.Source: I take it you had some sort of plan.
String.Dest: 我认为你有某种计划。

String.Source: Victory would be mine. I could see the oaf teetering as he struggled to drink bottle number 7.
String.Dest: 胜利属于我，我都能看见这呆子摇摇晃晃的好似喝了7瓶酒似的样子了。

String.Source: I take it you had some sort of plan.
String.Dest: 我认为你有某种计划。

String.Source: He was halfway through the bottle, all but dead when his thin lips curled into a mischievous smile.
String.Dest: 他只通过了那瓶子的一半儿，但在死亡之际，他的嘴角挑起了一个恶作剧的微笑。

String.Source: What did you choose?
String.Dest: 你选择什么?

String.Source: Earlier that day, I had asked Angeline what ingredients, when eaten raw, would help one resist poison. One of them was garlic.
String.Dest: 当天早些时候，我问过安吉琳什么原料生吃时能帮助人们抵抗毒素。其中一个是大蒜。

String.Source: Victory would be mine. I could see the oaf teetering as he struggled to drink bottle number 7.
String.Dest: 胜利属于我，我都能看见这呆子摇摇晃晃的好似喝了7瓶酒似的样子了。

String.Source: What did you choose?
String.Dest: 你选择什么?

String.Source: He was halfway through the bottle, all but dead when his thin lips curled into a mischievous smile.
String.Dest: 他只通过了那瓶子的一半儿，但在死亡之际，他的嘴角挑起了一个恶作剧的微笑。

String.Source: What did you choose?
String.Dest: 你选择什么?

String.Source: What were the rules?
String.Dest: 有什么规矩?

String.Source: The potion could only be imbibed when one of us had died from intoxication. My servant was on hand to ensure the rules were followed.
String.Dest: 这瓶药剂只有在我们中的一人中毒身亡时才能服用。我的仆人会保证这条规定被严格遵守。

String.Source: After 5 bottles, if we were both standing, we would take a break. The rules allowed us to eat anything in the inn, so long as it was already there.
String.Dest: 喝下五瓶以后，如果我们俩都还站着的话，我们就停下来喘口气。规则允许我们吃掉旅馆里的东西，任何看得见摸得找的东西。

String.Source: What were the rules?
String.Dest: 有什么规矩?

String.Source: The brute went for a haunch. I made no such request. I walked behind the counter and plucked my choice from the rack.
String.Dest: 那个暴徒想要个腰带，这样的请求当然不能拒绝。于是我走到柜台后面从架子上挑了一个。

String.Source: What were the rules?
String.Dest: 有什么规矩?

String.Source: That day, the Nord was here in Solitude. "What is it this time?" the fat boar asked me. "Daggers? Dice?" "Bottles of wine," I replied.
String.Dest: 那天，那个诺德人就在独孤城。“这次是啥？匕首？骰子？”那只肥猪问道。 “是酒瓶。”我回答说。

String.Source: I'm interested in the wine duel.
String.Dest: 我对斗酒挺有兴趣的。

String.Source: It was a drinking duel. We spread 21 bottles on a table, and took 10 each at random. The only bottle left was a cure disease potion.
String.Dest: 这是一个拼酒的决斗。我们把21个瓶子放在桌子上，在10个瓶子里随机装了些液体。只有一个瓶子里装的是除病药剂。

String.Source: I'm interested in the wine duel.
String.Dest: 我对斗酒挺有兴趣的。

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose.
String.Dest: 啊，是的。那么就不能匆忙解决了，这需要十年，不，二十年来完成。

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another.
String.Dest: 但今天是个庆祝的好日子！来眨眼雪鼠与我共饮吧！我为你举杯，为你歌颂，以君子之名向另一位君子致以我诚挚的祝福。

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.
String.Dest: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I will toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但今晚是值得欢庆的一夜！我会向你敬酒再歌颂赞美于你，这是绅士之间的行为。今夜实属首次！

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.
String.Dest: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady.
String.Dest: 但今晚是一个值得庆贺的一晚！和我在眨眼雪鼠里喝上一杯！我会给你敬酒并对你大唱赞歌，正如一个绅士对女士所做的那样。

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.
String.Dest: Ah, true. Then it should not be made in haste. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I will begin tomorrow.

String.Source: It better be a poem worthy of my stature.
String.Dest: 最好是一首为我量身定做的诗。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但今晚是值得庆祝的！我将向你敬酒，赞美你，作为一个绅士对一个淑女。这夜晚还只是个处​​女呢！

String.Source: Just recite the damn poem already.
String.Dest: 刚刚已经朗诵了那首该死的诗。

String.Source: The poem reads as follows: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 那首诗歌是这样写的：洞穴中传来龙语的轻吟，火虫在枯叶上写下诗篇。

String.Source: Just recite the damn poem already.
String.Dest: 刚刚已经朗诵了那首该死的诗。

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: Just recite the damn poem already.
String.Dest: 刚刚已经朗诵了那首该死的诗。

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: I'm sure it will be everything you say it is.
String.Dest: 我确定你百分百是对的。

String.Source: The poem reads as follows: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 那首诗歌是这样写的：洞穴中传来龙语的轻吟，火虫在枯叶上写下诗篇。

String.Source: I'm sure it will be everything you say it is.
String.Dest: 我确定你百分百是对的。

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: I'm sure it will be everything you say it is.
String.Dest: 我确定你百分百是对的。

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: I have added a new line! I must admit, seeing that Nord in the Draugr cheese he calls flesh inspired me!
String.Dest: 我又写了一行新的诗！我得承认，那一身尸鬼干酪样子，哦那个诺德人还说那是血肉，真是给了我灵感！

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: As you no doubt recall, the poem begins with: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 如果你的记忆无误的话，那首诗歌是这样开头的：洞穴中飘来龙语的吟唱，火虫在孤叶上写下诗章。

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: And now, the new line: The mountain turns the grass over, tucks in her sleeping child, a shrine to serenity, but serenity oft defiled.
String.Dest: 现在有新的变化：高山被夷为平地，人人易子而食，圣地的平静被亵渎。

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Couldn't keep away, could you? Too tempted by the chance to hear perfection, hm?
String.Dest: 能走开么你？偶尔听到变得完美的方法就这么有诱惑力么？嗯？

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Even if you aren't inclined to listen to poetry, it's so rare that anyone reaches the pinnacle of anything, as I have with this verse.
String.Dest: 就算你并无鉴赏诗歌的意趣，但能在一样物事之上登峰造极之人亦为少数，登峰造极如我所做此诗般。.

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Very well. If you wish for perfection, you shall have it.
String.Dest: 好啊。既然追求完美，，这东西你便值得拥有。

String.Source: How's the poem coming along?
String.Dest: 这诗写得如何了？

String.Source: Why are you rhyming your verse now? You weren't rhyming before.
String.Dest: 你怎么现在突然修起你诗歌的韵调来了？你以前从来不干这事的。

String.Source: That was unintentional! Or was it? You see how the rhyme defiled the verse, just as I intended?
String.Dest: 我是无意的！或者是故意的？你看这些韵调是如何玷污了那首诗歌，就象我故意去做的一样？

String.Source: Why are you rhyming your verse now? You weren't rhyming before.
String.Dest: 你怎么现在突然修起你诗歌的韵调来了？你以前从来不干这事的。

String.Source: Just as all adventurers defile the caves with their haphazard exploring.
String.Dest: 就像所有的冒险者玷污洞穴，随意探索。

String.Source: Why are you rhyming your verse now? You weren't rhyming before.
String.Dest: 你怎么现在突然修起你诗歌的韵调来了？你以前从来不干这事的。

String.Source: Just like the Nord defiles the air of this institution with his uncontrollable flatulence.
String.Dest: 就像一个诺德人用他无法无天的自负玷污这里的学术氛围.

String.Source: Top what? What are you working on?
String.Dest: 为什么在上面？你在干什么呢？

String.Source: Only the greatest poem ever conceived! Well, half conceived. But three more years and it shall be finished!
String.Dest: 只是这首最伟大的诗歌还在构思！呃，构思一半儿了。再有三年还是多少年就能写完啦！

String.Source: I can't wait to see the look on that stupid Nord's face when my very words rise from the page and become the sun.
String.Dest: 当我的文字在书页上熠熠生辉时，我都有些迫不及待的想看看那个愚蠢的诺德人的脸了。

String.Source: Top what? What are you working on?
String.Dest: 为什么在上面？你在干什么呢？

String.Source: Hm...you look like someone with a keen ear for poetry. Would you like to hear the weapon with which I will slay him?
String.Dest: 嘛…你看起来像是对流言蜚语极其敏感的人。你想用那只听听我武器们的声音，我会用那把削了他？

String.Source: Top what? What are you working on?
String.Dest: 为什么在上面？你在干什么呢？

String.Source: How will you deliver your poem to him?
String.Dest: 你要怎么把诗歌送到他手上？

String.Source: You can find him by his smell. When it comes time to deliver my poem, I'll follow that specific trail, to my nose's regret.
String.Dest: 只要循着他的臭味就能找到他。等到了要【交付】我诗集的时候，我会跟着那条特殊的路径，到【对不起自己鼻子的地方去】。

String.Source: The smell he emits is unlike any other. It's as if all the world's mildew collected in a single boot, and was left to ferment in a dragon's anus.
String.Dest: 他散发的臭味儿太过特别了。就像把世界上所有的霉菌收集在一个单身汉的靴子里，然后把它们塞进龙的肛门发酵一样。

String.Source: How will you deliver your poem to him?
String.Dest: 你要怎么把诗歌送到他手上？

String.Source: How will you deliver your poem to him?
String.Dest: 你要怎么把诗歌送到他手上？

String.Source: I dare say he must be a werewolf of some kind, the way he drags his hairy knuckles on the dirt.
String.Dest: 我胆敢说他一定是那种把他那多毛的指关节往土（肉酱）里插的狼人。

String.Source: Is this Nord's name Skjarn by chance?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人的名字是不是正好叫史卡盎？

String.Source: I don't know his name, and I don't care to. I imagine to utter it would be some sort of Daedric malediction, opening a portal to Oblivion.
String.Dest: 我不知道他叫什么，我也不在乎。我觉得这是某种魔族的诅咒，可以打开湮灭之门。

String.Source: Is this Nord's name Skjarn by chance?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人的名字是不是正好叫史卡盎？

String.Source: You'll know him by his looks. He's as ugly as a shalk, as graceful as a golem, and as fat as a Sea-Drake.
String.Dest: You'll know him by his looks. He's as ugly as a shalk, as graceful as a golem, and as fat as a Sea-Drake.

String.Source: Is this Nord's name Skjarn by chance?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人的名字是不是正好叫史卡盎？

String.Source: And much like those drakes of Black Marsh, his entire existence is an utter abomination.
String.Dest: 就像那帮黑沼泽省来的虫子们一样，他完全就是为了让人恶心而存在的。

String.Source: I don't know his name, and I don't care to. I imagine to utter it would be some sort of Daedric malediction, opening a portal to Oblivion.
String.Dest: 我不知道他叫什么，我也不在乎。我觉得这是某种魔族的诅咒，可以打开湮灭之门。

String.Source: What's this Nord's name?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人叫什么？

String.Source: You'll know him by his looks. He's as ugly as a shalk, as graceful as a golem, and as fat as a Sea-Drake.
String.Dest: You'll know him by his looks. He's as ugly as a shalk, as graceful as a golem, and as fat as a Sea-Drake.

String.Source: What's this Nord's name?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人叫什么？

String.Source: And much like those drakes of Black Marsh, his entire existence is an utter abomination.
String.Dest: 就像那帮黑沼泽省来的虫子们一样，他完全就是为了让人恶心而存在的。

String.Source: What's this Nord's name?
String.Dest: 这个诺德人叫什么？

String.Source: On the contrary, the good spirits are inside me! I plan on drinking this bilge rat's excuse for an inn dry. And I hope you join me.
String.Dest: 正相反，我现在心情很好！为了庆祝这个船老鼠的道歉，我打算把整家旅店都喝干！来和我一起吧！

String.Source: You seem to be in good spirits.
String.Dest: 你看起来神采飞扬啊。

String.Source: I knew that! It's poetic license. What other plant has the word "tongue" in it! It's not as if most people would even know that.
String.Dest: 我懂的！ 这是诗意的描述。还有什么植物会用到“舌头”这个词啊！甚至大多数人连想都没想过。

String.Source: Dragon's Tongue doesn't grow inside caves.
String.Dest: 龙舍草不生长在洞穴里。

String.Source: Dragon's Tongue doesn't grow inside caves.
String.Dest: 龙舍草不生长在洞穴里。

String.Source: Only alchemists and adventurers would point that out, and persnickety ones at that. Two groups of dullards that would never deign to hear a poem.
String.Dest: 只有练金术士和冒险者才会指出并对这如此挑剔。两组二货永远也不会对赏诗不屑一顾。

String.Source: Dragon's Tongue doesn't grow inside caves.
String.Dest: 龙舍草不生长在洞穴里。

String.Source: The line is but a decoration anyway. The heart of the poem is about how caves are a home, for the undead whose winter never comes.
String.Dest: The line is but a decoration anyway. The heart of the poem is about how caves are a home, for the undead whose winter never comes.

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: Yes, a fine song. Allow me to play it as it was meant to be.
String.Dest: 是的，一曲美妙的歌。请允许我将它原汁原味地演奏。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart! I tell you, I tell you, the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 【原版歌词替换】英雄，英雄，勇者无惧。我告诉你，我告诉你，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: With a Voice wielding power of the ancient Nord art; Believe, believe the Dragornborn comes;
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】诺德技艺，龙吼回归。没错，没错，他是龙裔。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: It's an end to the evil, of all Skyrim's foes; Beware, beware the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 终结邪恶，敌人的末日。当心，当心，龙裔出世。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: For the darkness has passed and the legend yet grows; You'll know, you'll know the Dragonborn comes.
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】黑暗消逝，传奇之曲正在编织。你会发现，你会发现，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: The scoundrel stuck the blade between his fingers, and every jab was a slash. I had outpunched him tenfold, but I was the worse for wear.
String.Dest: 这恶棍把刀片卡在他手指之间，每次猛击都是一道砍痕。我虽已十倍拳头奉还，但我的情况更加糟糕。

String.Source: How did he manage to use it?
String.Dest: 他是怎样成功使用它的？

String.Source: How did he manage to use it?
String.Dest: 他是怎样成功使用它的？

String.Source: Still, I would have claimed his feeble life, if not for a random gash over my eye, which blinded my vision.
String.Dest: 不过，要不是我眼睛上的划伤挡住了我的视野，我早就能收下他的小命。

String.Source: I would've continued, but my servant, who doubled as my squire, stepped in and called the match a draw.
String.Dest: 我本来还想继续，可我的仆人，也是我的护卫，走进来说比赛结果算平局。

String.Source: How did he manage to use it?
String.Dest: 他是怎样成功使用它的？

String.Source: Tell me about the bare knuckle brawl.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲徒手搏击。

String.Source: I was attending a party at the Thalmor embassy when Elenwen mentioned she'd found a delightful bard that reminded her of Razelan.
String.Dest: 我在梭默大使馆参加了一个聚会，那时爱琳温提到他碰到一个讨人喜欢的吟游诗人把她留在了Razelan。

String.Source: She even went so far as to bring the lowly knave to the party in a subtle attempt to mock the Redguard.
String.Dest: 她连那样的事都干得出来，把一个【低级贱民】带到宴会上用来旁敲侧击地取笑那个红卫人。

String.Source: Tell me about the bare knuckle brawl.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲徒手搏击。

String.Source: Tell me about the bare knuckle brawl.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲徒手搏击。

String.Source: Of course I recognized the fungal odor of dead animal musk immediately. Unfortunately, the Thalmor do not allow for weapons inside the embassy.
String.Dest: 当然我也马上认出了那种死动物麝香的真菌气味。但不幸的是，梭默们不允许任何武器进入使馆。

String.Source: I was forced to challenge the fat golem to a bare knuckle brawl, for my honor couldn't wait another second.
String.Dest: 为了不损我的荣誉，我不得不赤手空拳地与一只巨大的机器人对战。

String.Source: Tell me about the bare knuckle brawl.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲徒手搏击。

String.Source: Tell me about the bare knuckle brawl.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲徒手搏击。

String.Source: Little did I know he'd smuggled a small shiv in the nether region of his armor, a place not even the most obedient soldier was willing to frisk.
String.Dest: 我都不知道他在盔甲的私部藏了把小刀，那地方就算是最守纪的士兵也不愿去搜啊。.

String.Source: I've sent him off on an important errand. Sybille Stentor's obsessive meddling has caused me to worry about my father, and I need to be sure he's ok
String.Dest: 我派他去执行一项重要任务了。希比利·斯丹特的插手让我有些担心我的老爹的安全，我得去看看他是否还好。

String.Source: Where is your servant now?
String.Dest: 你的仆人现在在哪儿？

String.Source: I'm sure he'll come limping through the front gate soon enough with good news.
String.Dest: 我相信，很快他就会带着好消息，一瘸一拐地穿过前门。

String.Source: Where is your servant now?
String.Dest: 你的仆人现在在哪儿？

String.Source: I'm going to regret saying this, but fine. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 我会后悔说过这句话的，不过算了，唱你的诗吧。

String.Source: Oh, you will regret hearing it. For after one hears perfection, all other poems, nay, all other sounds will cease to have music.
String.Dest: 哦，你想听？你会后悔的。在你听到这如天籁般的声音后，其他的诗歌，甚至其他的声音，对你而言都会不堪入耳了。

String.Source: I'm going to regret saying this, but fine. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 我会后悔说过这句话的，不过算了，唱你的诗吧。

String.Source: They will wilt and wither under the sweet brandy of my words.
String.Dest: They will wilt and wither under the sweet brandy of my words.

String.Source: I'm going to regret saying this, but fine. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 我会后悔说过这句话的，不过算了，唱你的诗吧。

String.Source: The poem reads as follows: The cave is the heart where the dragon tongue sings, and the torchbug pens poetry upon a naked leaf.
String.Dest: 那首诗歌是这样写的：洞穴中传来龙语的轻吟，火虫在枯叶上写下诗篇。

String.Source: I'm going to regret saying this, but fine. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 我会后悔说过这句话的，不过算了，唱你的诗吧。

String.Source: Here lie seven generations of smells, where beds never cool, and windows never shut their eyes.
String.Dest: 这住了七代人，里面充满了他们的味道，这里的床永远是温暖的，窗户也从不关闭.

String.Source: I'm going to regret saying this, but fine. Recite your poem.
String.Dest: 我会后悔说过这句话的，不过算了，唱你的诗吧。

String.Source: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.
String.Dest: Where on a Middas of Sun's Dusk, the sky betrays its wintry master, where the sun dances with the nightshade, and spells cast calm on the day.

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: Yes, and life is not about how many breaths you take, but how often you listen to my poetry.
String.Dest: 对，而且啊生活的意义并不在于你活了多久，而是在于你听了多少我的诗歌。

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: Who else could take a subject as dreary as the undead living in caves, and turn it into a romantic masterpiece? I'll tell you who can't. The Nord.
String.Dest: 谁能把一个像是有着亡灵居住的洞穴那样阴森的题材变为一个浪漫的杰作？让我来告诉你谁不行吧。是诺德人。

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: But you sera, you have an ear for the sublime! It is an honor to meet a lady of such exquisite taste.
String.Dest: 但是先生,你有着令人赞叹的鉴赏力！迎合女士如此高雅的品味是我的荣幸。

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: Yes, and life is not about how many breaths you take, but how often you listen to my poetry.
String.Dest: 对，而且啊生活的意义并不在于你活了多久，而是在于你听了多少我的诗歌。

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: Who else could take a subject as dreary as the undead living in caves, and turn it into a romantic masterpiece? I'll tell you who can't. The Nord.
String.Dest: 谁能把一个像是有着亡灵居住的洞穴那样阴森的题材变为一个浪漫的杰作？让我来告诉你谁不行吧。是诺德人。

String.Source: That was wonderful. Truly a breathtaking verse.
String.Dest: 很精彩，真的是令人惊叹的诗句。

String.Source: But you sera, you have an ear for the sublime! It is an honor to meet a gentleman of such exquisite taste.
String.Dest: 但是先生，你有可以欣赏高雅的耳朵！能遇到一个有这样精致品味的绅士是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Yes, better to focus on my poem about the Nord, as it is quickly expanding into an epic.
String.Dest: 是的，最好关注下我那关于诺德的诗歌，因为它正迅速扩展为一部史诗。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: My nemesis may be dead, but he will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as cheating scoundrels.
String.Dest: 我的敌人也许已经死了, 但他仍然会在朔尔认为烂人死後该去的肮脏地方听到我的诗歌。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another.
String.Dest: 但今天是个庆祝的好日子！来眨眼雪鼠与我共饮吧！我为你举杯，为你歌颂，以君子之名向另一位君子致以我诚挚的祝福。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: Yes, better to focus on my poem about the Nord, as it is quickly expanding into an epic.
String.Dest: 是的，最好关注下我那关于诺德的诗歌，因为它正迅速扩展为一部史诗。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: My nemesis may be dead, but he will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as cheating scoundrels.
String.Dest: 我的敌人也许已经死了, 但他仍然会在朔尔认为烂人死後该去的肮脏地方听到我的诗歌。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I'll toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I'll toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another. The night is still a maiden yet!

String.Source: Yes, better to focus on my poem about the Nord, as it is quickly expanding into an epic.
String.Dest: 是的，最好关注下我那关于诺德的诗歌，因为它正迅速扩展为一部史诗。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: My nemesis may be dead, but he will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as cheating scoundrels.
String.Dest: 我的敌人也许已经死了, 但他仍然会在朔尔认为烂人死後该去的肮脏地方听到我的诗歌。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady.
String.Dest: 但今晚是一个值得庆贺的一晚！和我在眨眼雪鼠里喝上一杯！我会给你敬酒并对你大唱赞歌，正如一个绅士对女士所做的那样。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: Yes, better to focus on my poem about the Nord, as it is quickly expanding into an epic.
String.Dest: 是的，最好关注下我那关于诺德的诗歌，因为它正迅速扩展为一部史诗。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: My nemesis may be dead, but he will hear it from the depths of whatever latrine Shor has deemed fit for Nords who died as cheating scoundrels.
String.Dest: 我的敌人也许已经死了, 但他仍然会在朔尔认为烂人死後该去的肮脏地方听到我的诗歌。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: No, it's quite alright. Save your words.
String.Dest: 不，真的没事。别费口舌了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I'll toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但是今晚真是是值得庆祝！我敬你一杯，并祝福你，歌颂你。今夜如少女般美丽！

String.Source: She doesn't count! Not a single person is aware of who that traitorous bitch really is.
String.Dest: 她不算！谁都没有察觉那其实是个背信弃义的小婊子。

String.Source: Sybille Stentor holds a prominent position as Court Wizard.
String.Dest: 希比利·斯丹特担任了宫廷巫师这个重要的职务。

String.Source: In fact, she makes great efforts to hunt down our people to protect her secret. I defy any notion that she's one of us.
String.Dest: 实际上，她不惜余力地为了保守她的秘密而抓捕我们的人们。我反对任何将她视为我们中的一员的观点。

String.Source: Sybille Stentor holds a prominent position as Court Wizard.
String.Dest: 希比利·斯丹特担任了宫廷巫师这个重要的职务。

String.Source: Sybille Stentor holds a prominent position as Court Wizard.
String.Dest: 希比利·斯丹特担任了宫廷巫师这个重要的职务。

String.Source: There is not a cave left in Haafinger that the court wizard has not turned her eye upon.
String.Dest: 要是海芬加领一个山洞都没留下的话，那个宫廷巫师就没有能转移注意的东西了。

String.Source: That is why I have sent my servant to find my father and force him to return him to Solitude.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么我让我的随从去找我爸而且逼他回独孤城.

String.Source: Sybille Stentor holds a prominent position as Court Wizard.
String.Dest: 希比利·斯丹特担任了宫廷巫师这个重要的职务。

String.Source: When I'm through, there won't be a maiden in the house.
String.Dest: 当我经过的时候，房间里没有一个妹子。

String.Source: (Laughs) Cheers to you then, adventurer! As far as I'm concerned you can have them all. A gentleman such as myself must be more discerning.
String.Dest: (笑声) 为你干一杯，冒险家！我还在想你是不是不胜酒力呢。像我这样的君子一定要更有眼光一些。

String.Source: What Nord?
String.Dest: 什么诺德人？

String.Source: Only the ugliest, despicable, talentless man in all of Skyrim! Now he thinks to become a bard? I'll become thrice the bard he ever dreamt of being!
String.Dest: 这货是全天际最丑最讨厌最没本事的人！他还想做什么吟游诗人？他做梦都想象不到的程度我一个都能顶他仨！

String.Source: When he reads my poem, he will at last concede defeat once and for all, for one can't surpass perfection.
String.Dest: 当他读起我的诗的时候，他最终会完完全全的承认失败，因为那完美的无法超越。

String.Source: What Nord?
String.Dest: 什么诺德人？

String.Source: Even if by some miracle he were able to match it, he would still be left with a sour taste in his mouth knowing he came second.
String.Dest: 即使奇迹出现能让他把它打败，他心中仍会苦涩万分。他知道自己比它差。

String.Source: What Nord?
String.Dest: 什么诺德人？

String.Source: Hm...you look like someone with a keen ear for poetry. Would you like to hear the weapon with which I will slay him?
String.Dest: 嘛…你看起来像是对流言蜚语极其敏感的人。你想用那只听听我武器们的声音，我会用那把削了他？

String.Source: What Nord?
String.Dest: 什么诺德人？

String.Source: Perhaps another time.
String.Dest: 下次再说吧。

String.Source: Perhaps another time.
String.Dest: 下次再说吧。

String.Source: He was too daft to realize I was giving him a chance to die honorably, instead of like the coward he constantly proves himself to be.
String.Dest: 他太愚蠢，以至于终于才意识到我是在给他个能体面死去的机会，而不是像个他不断印证自己是的懦夫那样。

String.Source: If you don't wish to hear it, then fine. Its genius would be lost on you anyway.
String.Dest: 如果你不希望因它罚款......反正对你来说毫无意义。

String.Source: Perhaps another time.
String.Dest: 下次再说吧。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: With the mechanics of the duel altered, I was left with little choice but to call it a draw and return to my chambers.
String.Dest: 决斗规则的的改变，使得我别无选择。我只能承认它是一场平局，然后默默回自己的卧室去了。

String.Source: (Sigh) Half a bottle. No, just a few more sips and he would've been mine.
String.Dest: (叹息) 半瓶。不，只要几小口，而且他一直呆在矿井里。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Then what happened?
String.Dest: 那么发生了什么事情？

String.Source: I could see the flies milling about in and around his head. What was this scoundrel thinking?
String.Dest: 我可以看到成群的苍蝇绕着他的头嗡嗡乱转。这个恶棍是怎么想的？

String.Source: Then what happened?
String.Dest: 那么发生了什么事情？

String.Source: Then, like a frenzied troll, the fiend smashed the bottle on the table and swung the dagger of broken glass at my neck.
String.Dest: 接着，就像一个暴怒的巨人一样，那个魔鬼把桌上的所有瓶子都摔了个粉碎，拿起尖锐的碎玻璃向我的脖子划过来。

String.Source: Then what happened?
String.Dest: 那么发生了什么事情？

String.Source: Bleeding, half-drunk, I demanded his head for breaking the rules of the duel. Yet the fool only smiled.
String.Dest: 流着血，醉醺醺的，我想要【用他的脑袋破坏决斗的规则】。可这白痴只是在那傻笑。

String.Source: Then what happened?
String.Dest: 那么发生了什么事情？

String.Source: What? Who told you such lies? Was it the Nord? Perhaps not directly, but such mendacious taunts certainly originated from his lips.
String.Dest: 什么？谁跟你说的这谎话连篇的东西的？那个诺德人是不？可能不是他直接跟你说的，但这样胡编乱造的诽谤绝逼是首先从他嘴巴皮子里蹦出来的。

String.Source: How did you get into this college? Did you sleep with Viarmo?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进这学院的？跟院长睡过吗？

String.Source: How did you get into this college? Did you sleep with Viarmo?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进这学院的？跟院长睡过吗？

String.Source: Yes, Viarmo is a dashing Elf, and it is only because I am a man of impeccable taste that I am able to recognize him as such.
String.Dest: 是的，Viarmo 是个急性子精灵。那只是因为我拥有足够完美的味觉来用这种方式辨认出他来。

String.Source: Yet I doubt that even he, a master of the Poetic Edda, could even begin to contemplate the depth of my writings.
String.Dest: 并且我怀疑即使是他，Poetic Edda的大师，是否有能力哪怕仅仅是开始思考我文章中的深意。

String.Source: How did you get into this college? Did you sleep with Viarmo?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进这学院的？跟院长睡过吗？

String.Source: Of course, many in this town say I matriculated the old fashioned way. That I bought my way in. More lies spread by the Nord, no doubt.
String.Dest: 当然，在这个镇里面好多人都给我打上守旧的标签了。但是我就这么我行我素。无疑诺德人总是传出更多的流言蜚语。

String.Source: How did you get into this college? Did you sleep with Viarmo?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进这学院的？跟院长睡过吗？

String.Source: That's too bad. Some of the bards here look tasty.
String.Dest: 这太不好了。有几个吟游诗人看起来很好吃。

String.Source: While I can't feed on the students themselves, there are many who seek to attend the college who are denied admission.
String.Dest: 在那时我不能靠教导学生维持生计，于是就有很多想要加入学院的人被拒绝了。

String.Source: That's too bad. Some of the bards here look tasty.
String.Dest: 这太不好了。有几个吟游诗人看起来很好吃。

String.Source: No one ever wonders what happens to these nameless morsels.
String.Dest: 没人会在乎什么发生在这些无名小卒.

String.Source: To their kinsmen, they're attending college. Or training in hopes of getting in. To the college, however, they've long returned to their kin.
String.Dest: 至于他家里的男丁们，他们去了学院。或者去接受训练，希望能够进到学院里去。然而，他们很久之后才回到他们的亲族身边。

String.Source: That's too bad. Some of the bards here look tasty.
String.Dest: 这太不好了。有几个吟游诗人看起来很好吃。

String.Source: I hoped to feed on one such vagabond before she could return to Hammerfell, but she hasn't left the city. She may be a bard yet. How disappointing.
String.Dest: I hoped to feed on one such vagabond before she could return to Hammerfell, but she hasn't left the city. She may be a bard yet. How disappointing.

String.Source: That's too bad. Some of the bards here look tasty.
String.Dest: 这太不好了。有几个吟游诗人看起来很好吃。

String.Source: So you don't feed on students?
String.Dest: 所以你不以教导学生为生？

String.Source: While I can't feed on the students themselves, there are many who seek to attend the college who are denied admission.
String.Dest: 在那时我不能靠教导学生维持生计，于是就有很多想要加入学院的人被拒绝了。

String.Source: No one ever wonders what happens to these nameless morsels.
String.Dest: 没人会在乎什么发生在这些无名小卒.

String.Source: So you don't feed on students?
String.Dest: 所以你不以教导学生为生？

String.Source: To their kinsmen, they're attending college. Or training in hopes of getting in. To the college, however, they've long returned to their kin.
String.Dest: 对于他们的亲戚，他们在学院里学习，或者在努力考入。对于学院来说，他们早已回到他们的家族。

String.Source: So you don't feed on students?
String.Dest: 所以你不以教导学生为生？

String.Source: I hoped to feed on one such vagabond before she could return to Hammerfell, but she hasn't left the city. She may be a bard yet. How disappointing.
String.Dest: I hoped to feed on one such vagabond before she could return to Hammerfell, but she hasn't left the city. She may be a bard yet. How disappointing.

String.Source: So you don't feed on students?
String.Dest: 所以你不以教导学生为生？

String.Source: Where do you feed? The other students have reported no incidents.
String.Dest: 你在哪儿吃？其他学生报告说没有事故发生。

String.Source: Ah, you know as well as I that our kind cannot afford to create suspicion. It's a great shame to be forced to feed on beggars and travelers.
String.Dest: 呃，你知道我们这种情况决不能引起任何怀疑。有时不得不在乞丐和路人那里吸血真是丢死人了。

String.Source: The shame should be theirs. Our kind should be allowed to taste the flesh of masters, generals, Thanes, and Jarls.
String.Dest: The shame should be theirs. Our kind should be allowed to taste the flesh of masters, generals, Thanes, and Jarls.

String.Source: Where do you feed? The other students have reported no incidents.
String.Dest: 你在哪儿吃？其他学生报告说没有事故发生。

String.Source: Where do you feed? The other students have reported no incidents.
String.Dest: 你在哪儿吃？其他学生报告说没有事故发生。

String.Source: We should be carried around in gilded palanquins, while the common folk shout our names and reveal their necks, begging that we stop for a taste.
String.Dest: 我们应该被装在镀金的轿子里被带着走，那些乡民们总是伸长了脖子叫着我们的名字，求我们停下来让他们尝尝贵族肉的味道。

String.Source: Certainly. It seems you're a person of high caliber after all, if you seek to hear my voice, knowing it will sour all other notes.
String.Dest: 当然，毕竟看起来你是个有很高水准的人，如果你想倾听我的声音，了解透彻以后你会发现其它的笔记顿时索然无味。

String.Source: Do you take requests?
String.Dest: 你需要吗？

String.Source: What song shall I play?
String.Dest: 我应该演奏什么曲子？

String.Source: Do you take requests?
String.Dest: 你需要吗？

String.Source: Naturally, you wish for me to serenade you. However, I've just sat down. I'll need to stand and stretch before playing. Ask me then.
String.Dest: 你希望的剧情是我给你唱小夜曲……不过现在我只是坐一会罢了. 我在碰琴之前要活动下筋骨，那会再说吧。

String.Source: Do you take requests?
String.Dest: 你需要吗？

String.Source: So you fancy money, is it? Should he fail to return, I may be in need of a new servant, and you've proven more than capable.
String.Dest: 所以你想要钱，对吧？如果他不回来，我也许需要一个新的仆人，而你已经证明了自己更有能力。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But I'll need to interview at least 3 others first. You can't simply hire the first person who comes strolling through your doors.
String.Dest: 但我需要先面试另外至少3个人。你不能只是简单地雇佣第一个走进你大门的人。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I'll toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another.
String.Dest: 但今晚是值得庆祝的！要眨眼雪鼠来跟我喝一杯！我将为你敬酒，向你赞美，作为一个绅士敬另一个绅士。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: So you fancy money, is it? Should he fail to return, I may be in need of a new servant, and you've proven more than capable.
String.Dest: 所以你想要钱，对吧？如果他不回来，我也许需要一个新的仆人，而你已经证明了自己更有能力。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But I'll need to interview at least 3 others first. You can't simply hire the first person who comes strolling through your doors.
String.Dest: 但我需要先面试另外至少3个人。你不能只是简单地雇佣第一个走进你大门的人。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I'll toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但今晚是个庆祝的理由！我会敬你酒，赞颂你。这是两个绅士之间的行为。今夜实属首次！

String.Source: So you fancy money, is it? Should he fail to return, I may be in need of a new servant, and you've proven more than capable.
String.Dest: 所以你想要钱，对吧？如果他不回来，我也许需要一个新的仆人，而你已经证明了自己更有能力。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But I'll need to interview at least 3 others first. You can't simply hire the first person who comes strolling through your doors.
String.Dest: 但我需要先面试另外至少3个人。你不能只是简单地雇佣第一个走进你大门的人。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady.
String.Dest: 但今晚是一个值得庆贺的一晚！和我在眨眼雪鼠里喝上一杯！我会给你敬酒并对你大唱赞歌，正如一个绅士对女士所做的那样。

String.Source: So you fancy money, is it? Should he fail to return, I may be in need of a new servant, and you've proven more than capable.
String.Dest: 所以你想要钱，对吧？如果他不回来，我也许需要一个新的仆人，而你已经证明了自己更有能力。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But I'll need to interview at least 3 others first. You can't simply hire the first person who comes strolling through your doors.
String.Dest: 但我需要先面试另外至少3个人。你不能只是简单地雇佣第一个走进你大门的人。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: Sure, I suppose it's better than nothing. Not better than gold, however.
String.Dest: 好吧，有总比没有好。虽然有金币就更好了。

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! I will toast you and sing your praise, a gentleman to a lady. The night is still a maiden yet!
String.Dest: 但是今晚我们要尽情庆祝！我会向你敬酒和歌颂赞美，如同绅士向淑女般。待此夜如同处子！

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: 遵命。

String.Source: That's enough about your quarrel.
String.Dest: 你吵够了吧。

String.Source: I would be honored to hear this poem.
String.Dest: 聆听这首诗歌将是我的荣幸！

String.Source: I knew you would. You and I are both of cultured, civilized people, who value the arts as much as we value the sword.
String.Dest: 我就知道你会的。你和我都是高端大气上档次的人，我们重视艺术就想我们重视我们的剑一样。

String.Source: A poem worthy of you requires time. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I'll begin penning it on the morrow.
String.Dest: A poem worthy of you requires time. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I'll begin penning it on the morrow.

String.Source: I would be honored to hear this poem.
String.Dest: 聆听这首诗歌将是我的荣幸！

String.Source: I would be honored to hear this poem.
String.Dest: 聆听这首诗歌将是我的荣幸！

String.Source: But tonight is a cause for celebration! Join me at the Skeever for a drink! I will toast you and sing your praise, one gentleman to another.
String.Dest: 但今天是个庆祝的好日子！来眨眼雪鼠与我共饮吧！我为你举杯，为你歌颂，以君子之名向另一位君子致以我诚挚的祝福。

String.Source: I would be honored to hear this poem.
String.Dest: 聆听这首诗歌将是我的荣幸！

String.Source: I knew you would. You and I are both of cultured, civilized people, who value the arts as much as we value the sword.
String.Dest: 我就知道你会的。你和我都是高端大气上档次的人，我们重视艺术就想我们重视我们的剑一样。

String.Source: A poem worthy of you requires time. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I'll begin penning it on the morrow.
String.Dest: A poem worthy of you requires time. It will take ten, no, twenty years to compose. I'll begin penning it on the morrow.
